summary.para: Retrieves the number of elements in the collection.

param.name: p
param.para: The number of elements in the collection.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: This method is implemented in MSXML 1.0. It is no longer supported by Microsoft in current versions of MSXML. This documentation is provided for informational purposes only.

summary.para: Retrieves the child elements from a collection using their index, name, or both.

param.name: var1
param.para: A valid index numeric value (within the length of ) or the name of an element in the XML hierarchy.

param.name: var2
param.para: A valid index numeric value (within the length of ) or the name of an element in the XML hierarchy.

returns.para: Returns an IDispatch pointer to an addressable memory location where the collection is retrievable.

remarks.para: This method is implemented in MSXML 1.0. It is no longer supported by Microsoft in current versions of MSXML. This documentation is provided for informational purposes only.

summary.para: The IXMLElementCollection interface supports collection of XML elements for indexed access.
